shortdesc.ph: Describes the layout information of a sub video stream in a mixed stream.
Describes the position and state of a sub video stream in the video mixing layout.

section.p: Describes the position, size, and display state of a sub video stream in the composite canvas.

plentry.pd: The channel name to which the sub video stream belongs.
The user ID of the publisher of the sub video stream.
The X coordinate (in pixels) of the sub video stream on the composite canvas, indicating the horizontal offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the top-left corner of the canvas.
The Y coordinate (in pixels) of the sub video stream on the composite canvas, indicating the vertical offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the top-left corner of the canvas.
The width (in pixels) of the sub video stream.
The height (in pixels) of the sub video stream.

The display state of the sub video stream on the composite canvas:
0: Normal. The sub video stream is rendered on the canvas.
1: Placeholder image. The sub video stream has no video frame and is shown as a placeholder image on the canvas.
2: Black image. The sub video stream is replaced with a black image.
The name of the channel to which the sub video stream belongs.
The user ID that publishes the sub video stream.

The state of the sub video stream on the mixed video canvas:
0: Normal. The sub video stream is rendered on the mixed canvas.
1: Placeholder image. The sub video stream has no video frames and is displayed as a placeholder image on the mixed canvas.
2: Black image. The sub video stream is replaced by a black image.
The X coordinate of the sub video stream on the mixed canvas (in px), which is the horizontal offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the top-left corner of the canvas.
The Y coordinate of the sub video stream on the mixed canvas (in px), which is the vertical offset of the top-left corner of the video relative to the top-left corner of the canvas.
The width of the sub video stream (in px).
The height of the sub video stream (in px).
